name: Sterile Water
contraindications: • irrigation . injection infusion usual parenteral routes . ( 2.1 , 5.1 ) • volume and/or rate irrigation depend type procedure capacity surface area structure irrigated . ( 2.2 ) • preparation instructions full prescribing information . ( 2.1 , 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions: sterile water irrigation supplied single-dose plastic pour bottles flexible plastic containers follows : container product codes fill volume ( ml ) ndc plastic pour bottle 2f7112 250 0338-0004-02 2f7113 500 0338-0004-03 2f7114 1000 0338-0004-04 2f7115 1500 0338-0004-05 flexible plastic container 2b7114 1000 0338-0003-44 2b7116 2000 0338-0003-46 2b7117 3000 0338-0003-47 storage exposure pharmaceutical products heat minimized . avoid excessive heat . store room temperature ( 25°c ) : brief exposure 40°c adversely affect product .
indications_original: Sterile Water for Irrigation is indicated for use as an irrigant.
contraindications_original: • For Irrigation only. Not for injection or infusion by usual parenteral routes. ( 2.1 , 5.1 ) • The volume and/or rate of irrigation depend on the type of the procedure and the capacity or the surface area of the structure to be irrigated. ( 2.2 ) • For preparation and administration instructions see the full prescribing information. ( 2.1 , 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:

                     Storage
                  
                  Exposure of pharmaceutical products to heat should be minimized. Avoid excessive heat. 
                  Store at room temperature (25°C): brief exposure up to 40°C does not adversely affect the product.
